channel.title: Project-Cama v1
channel.description:
Hey guys! Camaloony here with my first project!
This will be trisidiax v2/PI based and should be released by the end of this year.
[b][u]I will be adding -[/u][/b] [b][u][b][color=green][u]Custon bosses:[/u][/color][/b] Man of all powers The fast and the furious The rapist And a secret one for 3rd generation donators[/u][/b] [b][u]Ingame controll panel for all ranks[/u][/b] [b][u][b][u][color=red]New ranks:[/color][/u][/b] As mentioned a seecret boss for 3rd generation donators 2kinds of mods - Community mods will be like mods normally are in rsps;s - Bug mods - Will have same benefits as normall mods but will be looking for bugs throughout there adventure's[/u][/b] [b][u]Comp/Max cape with colour edditing[/u][/b] [b][u][u][b][color=brown][u][b]New minigames and working rs minigames[/b][/u][/color] Nazi zombies idea from a source i use to have.[/b][/u] Point Patroll, like MW3 survival you go through waves and get upgrades on the way[/u][/b] [b][u]Working Dwarf Cannon[/u][/b] [b][u][color=pink][color=green][b][u]New item models[/u][/b][/color][/color] torva/pernix/virtus/bandos/armadyl - you get the picture?[/u][/b]
Thats only a select few becuz i am tired, ill edit tommorow
Post if i should add anything else below
ps: im looking for a pro trisidiax to help me with new models & ranks - never done that before if you want to help add me on skype - Camaloony or full name - cameron ofoluwa

item.title: Project-Cama v1
item.dc:creator: @camaloony camaloony
item.description:
@camaloony wrote:

Hey guys! Camaloony here with my first project!

This will be trisidiax v2/PI based and should be released by the end of this year.

I will be adding -
[color=green]Custon bosses:[/color]
Man of all powers
The fast and the furious
The rapist
And a secret one for 3rd generation donators
Ingame controll panel for all ranks
[color=red]New ranks:[/color]
As mentioned a seecret boss for 3rd generation donators
2kinds of mods - Community mods will be like mods normally are in rsps;s - Bug mods - Will have same benefits as normall mods but will be looking for bugs throughout there adventureâ€™s
Comp/Max cape with colour edditing
[color=brown]New minigames and working rs minigames[/color]
Nazi zombies idea from a source i use to have.
Point Patroll, like MW3 survival you go through waves and get upgrades on the way
Working Dwarf Cannon
[color=pink][color=green]New item models[/color][/color]
torva/pernix/virtus/bandos/armadyl - you get the picture?

Thats only a select few becuz i am tired, ill edit tommorow

Post if i should add anything else below

ps: im looking for a pro trisidiax to help me with new models & ranks - never done that before
if you want to help add me on skype - Camaloony or full name - cameron ofoluwa

Read full topic
